General.Name: Aksu Enerji ve Ticaret AS
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Aksu Enerji ve Ticaret Anonim Sirketi engages in the operation of hydroelectric power plant in Turkey. It produces and distributes hydroelectric and solar power. The company was incorporated in 1985 and is headquartered in Isparta, Turkey.

0.Name: Mr. Mustafa  Tutar
0.Title: Vice Chairman and Operations & Technical Mang.
